articles.author: Matt Egan
articles.title: The government shutdown is now the longest - and likely the most damaging in US history - CNN
articles.description: The ongoing government shutdown isn’t just the longest in American history. It’s likely the most damaging, too.
articles.content:
The ongoing government shutdown isnt just the longest in American history. Its likely the most damaging, too.
